name: SyncCrypt Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .kk extension has been renamed and encrypted by SyncCrypt ransomware . It contains a document, image, archive, database, or other type of file the ransomware is holding hostage. The .kk extension is added to the file's normal extension, producing a compound extension like .docx.kk .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
